english.segment1: Exalted, he is exalted. On high, he is exalted. Great is the Lord, let all the nations say. Exalted, he is exalted
english.segment2: Blessing and honor. Glory and power unto the Lord be praised. Sing with a chorus resounding before us. Holy is his name, his name
english.segment3: Exalted, he is exalted. On high, he is exalted. Great is the Lord, let all the nations say. Exalted, he is exalted
english.segment4: Blessing and honor. Glory and power unto the Lord be praised. Sing with a chorus resounding before us. Holy is his name
english.segment5: Blessing and honor. Glory and power unto the Lord be praised. Sing with a chorus resounding before us. Holy is his name, his name, his name
english.segment7: Blessing and honor. Glory and power unto the Lord be praised. Sing with a chorus resounding before us. Holy is your name
english.segment8: Blessing and honor. Glory and power unto the Lord be praised. Sing with a chorus resounding before us. Holy is your name, your name
english.segment9: Yahweh, Yahweh, holy is your name
